allstories.title: ‘Danny’s Mystery Unlocked’ by Arnav
allstories.description: Arnav in Year 5 is a author who published his first book called 'book ‘Danny’s Mystery Unlocked’ which can be found on Amazon India . Arnav also speaks to his fellow peers about bullying and gives his tips on writing a book.

allstories.title: At the ‘Fore’ Front of Golfing Excellence
allstories.description: Dominic Morton, Year 10 student, is excelling in golf after years of practice and determination. He was recently given the opportunity to play in the Pro-Am, professional golf event, at Jumeirah Golf Estates and played really well.

allstories.title: John Haffar - Sport Scholar
allstories.description: John Haffar is another one of our Sport Scholars. His main sport is basketball, but he is also a sporting enthusiast and takes part in many other sporting activities.
